title: Vinturi Mini Red Wine Aerator featuring Tenley Molzhan
description: The Vinturi Mini enhances the wine-tasting experience by allowing you to enjoy deliciously aerated wine anywhere.  This compact, portable wine aerator is an essential tool for anyone who appreciates all the flavor and bouquet that a properly decanted wine has to offer.  This compact aerator is only 5 5/8" tall, weighs 4 ounces and provides all the capabilities of its full size counterpart.

asset.author: VinturiStaff
asset.description: The Vinturi Mini enhances the wine-tasting experience by allowing you to enjoy deliciously aerated wine anywhere.  This compact, portable wine aerator is an essential tool for anyone who appreciates all the flavor and bouquet that a properly decanted wine has to offer.  This compact aerator is only 5 5/8" tall, weighs 4 ounces and provides all the capabilities of its full size counterpart.

transcripts: You may already know about the difference a Aerating makes to a wine flavor, aroma and your overall enjoyment but when you add in the mobility and flexibility of Vinturis portable mini red wine aerator you'll find that freedom never tasted so good. Vinturi mini red wine aerator infuses the air as you pour bringing out the wines intended flavor and bouquet. This compact portable a aerator is only five and a half inches and weighs only four ounces and includes a protective clip. Here's how it works, I'm going to hold mini aerator about my glass making sure not to block any of the air tubes after all air infuses the wine allowing it to airy quickly make sure the wine is at the halfway point at the bowl to maintain pressure and to avoid leakage through the air holes, now I'm going to pour the red wine. Hear that, that that is unique to Vinturi aerators even our mini, it means our wine is being fully aerated to maximize your enjoyment. I'll put the protective clip back on because this is a portable aerator you want to keep it clean while traveling and avoid drips after use. Both old and young wines can really benefit from being aerated. The Vinturi mini aerator makes a wonderful gift and truly enhances the wine tasting experience anywhere, enjoy.
